data.message: My favourite album of all times. But eminem come on bro...drop some damn music now, I m tired of hearing these cocksuckers bragging abt their favourite rappers, I m tired of hearing these trap rappers bragging abt things they dont even have. I wanna hear something real and only you can give it to me. Lets show these motherfuckers tht you are still the rap god. And make sure tht there is hell of a story-telling song in ur upcoming album.
